name: Apex mocks
description: ApexMocks is a mocking framework for the Force.com Apex language.It derives it's inspiration from the well known Java mocking framework Mockito

name: Apex Commons
description: Common Apex Library supporting Apex Enterprise Patterns and much more!

name: Apex Commons Sample Code
description: Samples application illustrating the Apex Enterprise Patterns library

name: Apex Metadata API
description: Apex Wrapper for the Salesforce Metadata API

name: Apex Core HttpCallout
description: Apex HTTP Callout Framework.

name: Polyforce
description: PolyForce is the project started as an idea with a motive create polymer applications/components that derive data from Salesforce, The idea create a robust set of polymer components that can mutually be shared with each other and on the other hand provide a working sample for developers to learn and get inspired to built more components

name: Salesforce to Github
description: Github API client in Apex for Force.com

name: Apex UML Digram Maker
description: Create UML diagrams from Apex code using the Tooling API

name: SfApexDoc
description: A full-featured Apex documentation generator, similar to JavaDoc.

name: Visualforce TableGrid
description: TableGrid is a free, open-source Force.com library, that provides users and developers a highly customizable, native-looking, sortable, filterable, editable Grid Visualforce component. This component can be used as an advanced, highly configurable (by developer and user) replacement of apex:pageBlockTables and Standard Related Lists

name: Force.com ESAPI
description: Enterprise Security API for the Apex language on the Force.com platform. This library consists of three modules - Validation, Output Encoding and Access Control(CRUD, FLS and Sharing).

name: R.apex
description: Functional library for Apex. This library, inspired by Ramda.js, offers a bunch of utility functions to manipulate Apex collections, as well as extensive support for functional programming.

name: Force DI
description: Generic dependency injection (DI) library with support for injecting Apex, Visualforce, Lightning, and Flows at runtime.

name: Query.apex
description: SOQL query builder on Salesforce.com platform, which supports complex conditions, field and namespace management, child relationships query, and functional programming style coding.

name: Apex Chainable Batch
description: Apex Batches can be chained by calling the successor batch from the finish() method of the previous batch. But such hardcoding makes this model inflexible. It's hard to build the chain from outside, neighter from a central class nor on runtime dependant on business logic.

name: Apex Test Kit
description: Apex Test Kit can help generate massive sObject data for Apex test classes. It is can help establish arbitrary levels of many-to-one, one-to-many relationships, and also generate field values based on simple rules automatically.

name: Weave
description: Sublime Text Plugin to generate boilerplate Salesforce Code Templates

name: GitHub Salesforce Deploy Tool
description: Automagically deploy a GitHub repository to a Salesforce ORG

name: Push Notification Plugin for iOS and Android
force-dev-tool
description: Command line tool supporting the Force.com development lifecycle.

name: Sweet.apex
description: Sweet.apex is the next generation of Apex development, transpiling Sweet Apex(a feature-rich Apex-like code) to Apex classes.

name: soql-parser-js
description: JavaScript library for parsing SOQL queries, composing SOQL queries, and formatting SOQL queries.

name: Adminite
description: A query editor desktop app with built-in auto completions, inline data editing, and more.

name: GitIgnore for Salesforce
description: Reusable .gitIgnore file for Salesforce or Force.com Projects

name: Salesforce Git Repo
description: Grab all latest salesforce open source projects here, you will find awesome projects, framework, libraries that salesforce and opened for the world

name: Salesforce Labs
description: Checkout open source and experimental projects from Salesforce Team. Get an early access to features that can qualify in feature and contribute your ideas

name: Salesforce Mobile UI - Polymer Elements for Salesforce
description: Polymer Elements for Salesforce - Mobile UI Elements is a free, open-source Force.com (unsupported) library to simplify the development of mobile apps. The library, based on the Google’s Polymer framework, provides the fundamental building blocks for creating HTML5 apps that run well on smartphones and tablets

name: ForceServer
description: It supportes a proxy and web server, ForceServer is a simple development server aimed at providing a simple and integrated developer experience when building applications that use Salesforce OAuth and REST services.

name: JSForce - JSforce (f.k.a. Node-Salesforce)
description: JSforce (f.k.a. Node-Salesforce) - it capsulates the access to various APIs provided by Salesforce in asynchronous JavaScript function calls.Unlike other Salesforce API libraries, it is intended to give integrated interface both server-side and client-side apps, so you don't have to rewrite similar logics with different libraries only for running in different environment.Additionally, it has useful command line interface (CLI) which gives interactive console (REPL), so you can learn the usage without hassle.

name: ForceSniffer - Device Detection Library for Salesforce
description: Device Detection Library for Salesforce - Simplified Library that detect Mobile Devices, Salesforce1 App and other Saleforce Context.

name: ForceJS
description: With ES6 support now, this micro library designed to use the Salesforce REST APIs in JavaScript Apps

name: nForce
description: nforce is a node.js salesforce REST API wrapper for force.com, database.com, and salesforce.com

name: ForceTK
description: a minimal Force.com REST API for JavaScript apps

name: ForceEng
description: Micro-Library to use Salesforce REST API in AngularJS apps

name: Formulon
description: Formula parser completely implemented in ES6. See Demo

name: Scripting Toolkit
description: Windows based toolkit to run native Javascript to access Salesforce data.

name: Salesforce Lightning Design System - Office UI library based on Lightning Experience Design Language
description: Office UI library based on Lightning Experience Design Language - With the Lightning Design System you can build custom applications with a look and feel that is consistent with Salesforce core features — without reverse engineering our styles! Simply download our platform-agnostic CSS framework and get started today.

name: Feather - Google Material Design Mockup for Salesforce
description: Google Material Design Mockup for Salesforce - Library

name: React Components for Saleforce Lightning Design System

name: ForceSpinner

name: SFXOrgData

name: DreamFactory Monarch

name: Talend

name: Trailhead

name: Udacity Course
